name: Orb of Light
flavor: You create a small orb of light.
description: You create a material orb which gives off natural light.

name: Calm Emotions
flavor: You calm the emotional state of creatures.
description: All entities within the area must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target suppress any negative emotional state, such as Anger and Rage. The Fear state is reduced by one degree. The effects of this spell last until the End Phase.

name: Flare
flavor: You create a blinding flash of light.
description: All entities within the area must make a PhR Check. A target recieves a +4 deed bonus if they are looking away from the center of the area or if they have their eyes covered -- closing their eyes is not sufficient to count as cover.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1 to 9
entries: The target gains Partially Blind state. The state remains for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure.

description.name: DoF 10+
entries: The target gains Totally Blind state. The state remains for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure. Once the number of rounds remaining is less than 10, the target suffers the Partially Blind state instead of the Partially Blind state.

name: Light Screen
flavor: A barrier of light forms to protect you.
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait. The barrier has Damage Weakness to darkness damage.

effect: The barrier is immune to attacks using the Physical Damage Group that do not have the [@trait Imbued @] trait.

name: Perceive
flavor: Your eyes fill with a powerful light, that enhances all your senses.
description: You gain a power bonus to Notice and Search Checks. This power bonus also applies to Magic Appraisal Checks make to sense and measure mana.

name: Armor of Light
flavor: Particles of light solidify into a protective suit of armor.
description: You gain a natural AV against Force and Light Damage Types and half as much against the Physical and Elemental Damage Groups.

name: Rebuke Darkness
flavor: The creatures of shadow are harmed by this spell.
description: The first time time a darkness elemental or a creeature composed of negative emotions enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, it must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected and does not need to repeat the Resistance Check for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 20 force damage per Degree of Failure. If the target uses the Rex Damage Role, the final damage is multiplied by their Rex Multiplier.

description: This spell fills the zone with natural light.

name: Detect Negative Emotions
flavor: Using the light, you are able to sense the negative threads of energy around you.
description: You detect the negative emotions of all entities within the zone. This sense informs you of the type and intensity of negative emotion but not its location. You can also detect creatures composed of negative emotions, and sense their location. A target can resist the detection by making a SR Check.

name: Light Beam
flavor: A beam of intense light flies forth.
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes light damage.

name: Hologram
flavor: This spell creates the image of an entity.
description: You create a visual active figment that is no larger than the listed size. The illusion is composed of light; it cannot interact with any entity and it disappears when it is hit by an attack with the Imbued trait. An entity can determine the nature of the illusion by making an Almost Impossible (24) Notice Check or a Very Difficult (16) [@skill Search @] Check.

effect: 3 cubic feet or about a Medium sized creature
50 cubic feet or about a Large sized creature
150 cubic feet or about a Huge sized creature
300 cubic feet or about a Gargantuan sized creature

name: Chains of Light
flavor: Chains of light latch onto a creature.
description: Make a Trap maneuver using the listed Strength against the target. The chains are material and have a Fortitude of 25 but have the Imbued trait and can only be sundered by an object with the Imbued trait.

name: Control Light
flavor: This spell gives you control over the light around you.
description: You can perform the following actions while you maintain the spell:

description.name: Control Creature of Light
entries: You can gain control over a light elemental within the zone. The target must make a SR Check.

entries.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this action for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.

entries.name: DoF 1+
entries: You gain active control over the target. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. If the target ever leaves the zone or the spell ends, your control ends.

description.name: Modify Light
entries: You can change the shape, color, and intensity of a source of light within the zone. You cannot increase the intensity to more than twice its original value.

description.name: Redirect Light
entries: You can take this reaction when an attack using Darkness Damage passes through the zone, it suffers `D2` on the Offensive Roll.

name: Detect Life
flavor: The light allows you to sense the life around you.
description: You detect the life of creatures within the zone. This sense informs you of the location of creatures but not their strength. A target can resist the detection by making a SR Check.

name: Spy of Light
flavor: An eye of light appears before you.
description: You must actively control the spy. The spy is material but only visible on the mana plane. It uses the Ludus Damage Role and has a Base Damage Negate of 20 that can be overcome with an Imbued attack. The spy has a Flight Value of 14; if it flies farther than the listed distance it disappears. You gain the following actions:

description.name: See Through Spy
entries: This intention allows you to project your sight through the spy. The spy has the listed Final Skill Value for the Notice and Search Skills.

description: While you can see the spy or are seeing through it, you can use your Spell Projection to perform Defensive Rolls for the spy.

name: Imbue with Positive Feeling
flavor: This spell imbues creatures with a feeling of ecstasy.
description: The first time an entity enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, they must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this casting of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target feels an overwhelmingly pleasureable sensation, causing a -2 all-action penalty. The pleasure also allows the target to ignore the penalties from the Pain state caused by exhaustion or Criticals.

name: Banish Negative Emotions
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check with a final roll value of 0.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target cannot feel negative emotions for one minute per Degree of Failure. The exception is the Fear state, which is reduced by one degree. The target can repeat the Resistance Check when they take damage, this new Check does not change the remaining duration. The effects of this spell do not require maintenance.

name: Healing Light
description: The target recovers Life Points. This spell cannot restore damaged limbs or eliminate Pain.

name: Seeking Light
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes light Damage and the spell ends.

If the target dodges, the spell places itself next to the target. You can make another Offensive Roll with the spell next round by taking the Use an Active Power action. The range of the spell is considered from the new location. If the target blocks, the spell is hit with an Imbued attack, or you stop maintaining the spell, the spell ends and it cannot make any more Offensive Rolls. You can use your Spell Projection to dodge any attack targeting the spell.
You can choose to stop controlling the spell. The spell will then act on its own Initiative Roll of 0. The Offensive Rolls and Defensive Rolls of the spell uses the listed final roll.

name: Zone of Detection
description: You detect any living creature within the zone. This sense informs you of each creatures location and if any other detection spell overlaps with this one. A target -- or the caster of the detection spell -- can resist the detection by making a SR Check.

name: Enter Another's Dream

target.target: one sleeping creature within jump range

description: The target must make a SR or MR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends and the target is immune to your casts of this spell until falling asleep again.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You physically enter the dream of the target. You have no control over the dream and anything that happens there is real to you. You return to the material plane near the current dreamer when the spell ends or when the dreamer wakes up, dies, or has their dream become a nightmare.
While you are in the dream, you can jump to the dream of another creature within jump range. The new target must make a SR or MR Check. If the new target succeeds, you remain in your current dream.

If you enter a dream that overlaps with the Veil, you do not return to the material plane when the spell ends. If you jump to another dream that does not overlap with the Veil before the spell ends, you can return normally.
If you die in the dream, you body remains in the targets dream.

name: Light Form
description: The target gains the Immaterial and Imbued traits and can choose to interact with material entities at will. The target also gains a power bonus to Notice and Search Checks and half that to Resistance Checks against light-based powers. Lastly, the target doubles the Final Damage from any attack using darkness damage.

effect: As intermediate degree but the Resistance Check bonus applies to all Resistance Checks not against darkness-based powers
As advanced degree but the target does not take additional damage from Darkness Damage

name: Blessing
description: All entities of your choice within the zone gain A1 on their Skill and Resistance Checks. A target cannot be affected by more than one Blessing spell.

name: Create Positive Feeling
description: All entities within the zone must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this casting of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is filled with positive feelings, such as love and friendship. Any Resistance Check or Composure Check to prevent Fear, Pain, Rage, or any other negative emotion benefit from A1. A target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed or when they take damage.

name: See Truth
description: The target gains the ability to see beyond the material plane. They also gain a power bonus to Resistance Checks against phantasmal illusions.

effect: The target can see mana, phenom, and spirits
As base, but the target can see invisible beings

name: Shield from Negative Emotions
description: The first time time a darkness elemental or an entity composed of negative emotions enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, it must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected this round.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 10 atomic damage per Degree of Failure and gains the Pain (4) state. The Pain state lasts until the target leaves the zone, but the target can only be subject to the Pain once from any Shield from Negative Emotions spell. If the target uses the Rex Damage Role, the final damage is multiplied by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Find
description: You must provide a descrption of an entity that you wish to find. The description can be vague or have strict rules. The closest entity that matches the description must make a SR Check. The spell is unable to search beyond an Imbued wall.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell configuration will try to find the next closest entity that matches the description within the area. If there is no other entity that matches, the spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You learn the location of the target.

name: Restore
description: The target removes a number of degrees of [@state Pain @] that have been caused by low Stamina, hunger, non-Critical Damage, or a power.
This spell only removes the [@state Pain @], it does not prevent it from returning.

name: Hypnotic Display
description: All targets must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this cast of the spell.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gains the Fascinated state, with the pattern being the object of fascination. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. They also can make a new Resistance Check when they take damage, with a +2 deed bonus, but this Resistance Check cannot increase the number of minutes remaining.

name: Catastrophic Light
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes light damage.

name: Luminous Material
description: You create an object whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value or twice your Presence. The object's quality bonus can be no greater than the listed value.

name: Travel by Light
description: All targets are instantly transported to a point of your choosing. If the destination is beyond the listed distance or blocked by an Imbued entity, the spell fails. The spell also fails if you are not in a lit area at the time of casting or if there is no light where you intend to end up. You must have a general idea of destination, but do not need to be able to see it.
A target is informed if it would would be transported into an unnatural position, such as in the air with no Flight Value.

name: Lord of Dreams
description: The entity whose dream you are in must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You gain control over the dream as if you had Nornir 45 -- all other benefits of Nornir do not apply. If the target is having a nightmare, you instead only have Nornir 30. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.
The spell ends if you return to the material plane. If you jump to a new dream, the new dreamer can make a Resistance Check.

effect: If you are in the Veil and in an area of positive emotion, you can control your surroundings as if it were a dream. Neutral areas and areas of negative emotion use the reduced Nornir. This does not work if there is a creature with similar or greater levels of Nornir nearby.

name: Create Creature of Light
description: You create a monad creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is a light elemental with Nornir 20.

name: Reflecting Prism
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. You also gain the Reflect Power action.

description.name: Reflect Power
entries: You can take this reaction when you obtain at least 1 Degree of Success on a Defensive Roll with a Reflecting Prism against an attack power. You can make a Power Collision using the listed Base Damage. On a failure, the attacking power dissipates into nothing.

On a success, you can make an Offensive Roll using your Spell Projection and gain a Counter bonus equal to half your Degree of Success on the Defensive Roll. The attack has the same Base Damage, effects, and traits as the original attack.
You can use this to reflect an area attack, but you only reflect the part that hits you.

name: Omniscience
description: You can see and hear all actions and understand the thoughts of all entities in the zone whose Presence is less than your and the listed value. This spell is not a detection spell and no Resistance Check is possible.

name: Predict
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: You foresee future events that could have the highest probability of occurring to the target.

effect: A prediction that is one day away will be very accurate
A prediction that is one year away will be very accurate

name: Prison of Light
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is sent to a pocket dimension that takes the form of a luminous glass bead. The target target is completely unable to observe what happens outside the pocket dimension. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check. The spell only ends when the spell is no longer maintained or the bead is broken.
The bead can be damaged from outside or from within by an attack with the Imbued (18) trait. The bead uses the Rex Damage Role -- it has Absorption 10 and Regeneration 19.

description: An entity outside the bead can use the Project into the Pocket Dimension action to communicate with the entity held inside.

description.name: Project into the Pocket
entries: When you take this intention you must make a Focus Check of 15. If you fail, you lose all your AP and become Flat-Footed. If you succeed, you form a projection of yourself within the pocket dimension in front of the entity held within. For each degree of success, you can maintain this projection for one minute. You must take this intention each round you wish to control the projection.
The projection can speak, see, and hear what happens within the bead and can move around with a Flight Value equal to your Focus. This projection is otherwise a figment that requires active control.

effect: The prison cannot be broken from the inside

name: One with the Light
description: You enter a state of meditation in which your body becomes one with the light. You leave this world and travel to the Nexus to nourish yourself with the energies found there. While there, you are only aware of your own body; the passage of time is meaningless. Your Mana Recovery is multiplied by 10 and you gain a physical and spiritual Regeneration Value of 16. While there is no maintenance cost, you can remain in the Nexus for the listed time, you can try to leave early but there is a 50% chance it will take you the entire time.

name: Pure Ascension
description: The target gains the listed Nornir value and the Divine feature.

name: Lumen Onslaught
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes light damage. The attack has the Flowing and Immaterial (20) traits. A target that takes any damage must make a SR Check. If the target is reduced to zero or fewer Life Points, the target automatically fails the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected, but still takes the damage.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is lost in the light. Their body and soul are completely destroyed.

description: This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area, but you, is equally affected.
